Title: Loving Yourself, Your Way
Description:
If it's a challenge you're after, I think I have an idea.

I saw a boastful champion heading toward Razor Hill. You could challenge him to a duel.

This would satisfy your desire and perhaps teach him a valuable lesson in humility.
ObjectivesText: Defeat Poggchug Ragethrower in a duel near the road to Razor Hill.
PortraitGiverText: This barbarian braggart could be confronted for a challenge.
